extendedInfo.description: ** IMPORTANT **I keep getting requests like "can you make this app work on a certain device/rom" almost everyday.If the app doesn't work on your device, make sure to include the following information in your request or I WILL ignore it:    1. Your device manufacturer/model.    2. Your mobile operator.    3. A dump of system log messages.    4. Your ROM information.    5. What you've done and what's not working.You can support the further development by donating. I accept donations via PayPal: http://goo.gl/nzXTUPeople in Iran who are interested in donating can send me an email and I will respond with further instructions.---It seems many people having issues with WiFi in 4.x builds when SIM-Card is inserted.WiFix tries to solve this problem by changing the WiFi country code.Using WiFix Manager you can easily install/update WiFix.NOTE: Make sure to dial *#94349# (*#WIFIX#) after installing WiFix.Visit http://www.fardjad.com/android/wifix/ for more info.WiFix and WiFix Manager are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs 3.0 Unported License. Visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/3.0/ for more information.

reviews.title: Get error invalid MMI
reviews.comment: Not really much use to me as I get this error when I enter *#wifix#.  WIFI still dead sigh!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Restored life on my HTC Sensation
reviews.comment: After the official  ICS update in March, my device was handicapped without wifi connection. Last 8 months I was only relaying on the mobile data connection for all data requirement and waiting for htc to come up with an update to fix the wifi issue. After 8 months I decided to get my device rooted and installed custom rom, however the issue was not solved and now after installing wifix, my device is breathing wifi with ease. Thanks to WifixManager and the developers.
reviews.author: Deepak R

reviews.title: Works well for Jelly Bean on S III Mini
reviews.comment: My phone didn\'t see 5 GHz. After applying this app the problem was fixed at once. Thank you! You have to root your phone before using this app
reviews.author: Vasiliy Kulgaviy

reviews.title: awesome
reviews.comment: Since i update ics my lg optimus 2x su660 wifi not working. Wifix fix my wireless connection. Now my wifi works brilliant. Really thank you for this pro s developpers.
reviews.author: Ganbaatar Dashnyam

reviews.title: CONNECTION PROMBLEM OR INVALID MMI
reviews.comment: hey mate uhmm yeah doesn\'t work on my phone I dial *#94349# and that comes up and when I click check for updates it pops up with error and it hasn\'t asked for superusers permision I have a HTC sensation with beats audio z715e if you could do anything would really apreciate and even donate
reviews.author: Kurt Williams

reviews.title: So far so good, but update needs work
reviews.comment: So far so good... my wifi seems not to disconnect anymore but in the app itself it has an update feature but it can\'t read the current installed version number.

reviews.title: you save my day!
reviews.comment: many thanks! I thought I have a hardware issue already. I\'ll recommend you to fellow vega s5 user. thanks again!

reviews.title: Working on samsung galaxy mini
reviews.comment: Had this problem for a few days now and this app was all I needed to fix my problem, thanks!
reviews.author: Jack Tomkins

reviews.title: Woah, this app fixed my wifi connection problem!
reviews.comment: So far this app is a Godsend.  I\'ve had my Skyrocket for probably almost a year now and the wifi function never worked (I\'d click connect and nothing would happen) after I flashed a ROM onto it.  Luckily I have unlimited data so I was just using that the whole time.  Today I finally looked up how to fix my wifi connection problem and found a forum thread directing me to an app called \"wifix.\"  I downloaded it and all of a sudden my wifi works....!!   This is ridiculously awesome, thanks so much.
reviews.author: Jordan Spence

reviews.title: Works like charm
reviews.comment: Works perfectly :) Model: Sansung galaxy y gts5360 ROM: Hyperion 8 titan if tge east
